short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically get hidden email information on YouTube channel 'About' pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Email Revealer is a Chrome browser extension designed to help users automatically reveal hidden email information on YouTube channel "About" pages. Simply install the extension and visit the "About" page of any YouTube channel. This extension will automatically attempt to uncover hidden email information, even if the user needs to click the "More" button to view contact details.
